analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0x637d1f6532b94b0d88f02bdaf4a3a2e53885291b.sol#352-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.autoTransfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0x637d1f6532b94b0d88f02bdaf4a3a2e53885291b.sol#367-370)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0x637d1f6532b94b0d88f02bdaf4a3a2e53885291b.sol#352-375):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(isICOStarted || token.getTotalSoldTokens() < 150000000000000004194304) (/unique_chucks/12/0x637d1f6532b94b0d88f02bdaf4a3a2e53885291b.sol#354-357)
	- discountPercents = getDiscount() (/unique_chucks/12/0x637d1f6532b94b0d88f02bdaf4a3a2e53885291b.sol#360-361)
	State variables written after the call(s):
